pages.text: Drones automatically land on drone pads. They need to completely recharge in order to take off.

Drones can carry cardboard boxes and barrels. To put a payload on the drone, wait until it landed and put the item into the drone pad. Note, that the drone will only take of if it is fully charged and has a payload.$(br)It can take a while until the drone returns from a delivery.

Drones are very fragile. If it collides with a block or an entity, it will break. Drones also break when coming in contact with liquids.$(br)If a drone breaks while carrying a payload, it will drop it. So please make sure the drone has a clear path up when loading a drone.

If a drone breaks, another drone will respawn after a short while. If this isn't the case, check if the drone pad has enough clearing to the top. You can check this by clicking on the drone pad. If the GUI shows up, it is fine.
